member.name: T:SobekCM.URL_Rewriter.Rewriter
member.summary: Rewrites the URL to remove the ugly query string context in many cases
member.remarks: This extends the IHttpModule class. This allows for the query string to be constructed from the longer URL, providing cleaner URLs with less visible query strings. This class would take an incoming URL like http://ufdc.ufl.edu/UF00012345/00002/2j and do an internal rewrite so that within the application the URL is actually http://ufdc.ufl.edu/sobekcm.aspx?urlquery=UF00012345/00002/2j&portal=ufdc.ufl.edu.
